get.description:
查询每日交易数量交易列表，按当天日期往后desc
参数：
- limit: 默认10
- offset: 默认0

  

*****
The GraphQl query for this endpoint is:
``` graphql
query tx_daily_counts ($limit: Int = 10, $offset: Int = 0) {
  list: daily_transaction_counts_view(offset: $offset, limit: $limit, order_by: {id:desc}) {
    record_date
    nums
  }
}

```

get.description:
## 获取UpdateState交易列表
- 参数
- limit : 默认10，选填
- offset: 默认0 ，选填
-返回数据示例
```Json
{
    "rollapp_state_msgs": [
      {
        "created_at": "2024-12-31T06:28:37.048697+00:00",
        "creator": "me1ry409f0xe6756wcv6q6epwd0sx3qxww8mmhtrf",
        "height": 724,
        "num_blocks": 23,
        "rollapp_id": "rollappevm_1234-1",
        "start_height": 1,
        "success": true,
        "tx_hash": "C3E1525D664D7D94CAE9C9816FAB68A4714280E80C000F7F3093AE732236CA60"
      }
    ]
}
```

*****
The GraphQl query for this endpoint is:
``` graphql
query update_states ($offset: Int = 0, $limit: Int = 10) {
  rollapp_state_msgs(offset: $offset, limit: $limit) {
    created_at
    creator
    height
    num_blocks
    rollapp_id
    start_height
    success
    tx_hash
  }
}

```

get.description:
## 查询所有区的模块地址，默认按ans降序排序
@author: Jack
- 请求方式：get
- 请求参数：无
- 请求示例：/api/rest/region/account-list

```json
{
  "region_account_list": [{
    "region_id": "global_village",
    "operator_address": "gea1e9nnt4s4m6avfseaklf6l335l7mqsl5uj3vk5t",
    "delegation_address": "gea19f8g2yh3lyk0zx4m8tkl8na2gwnhc89manegh0",
    "base_account": "gea1c4g5aekzjn8k4x9hhafhtxvaccc3c6flzmwv7h",
    "fixed_delegation_account": "gea1ar6wermx6zrq2tp250tks4dr0rvea5m0m2jj3v",
    "region_gas_fee_account": "gea1e9nnt4s4m6avfseaklf6l335l7mqsl5uj3vk5t",
    "swap_pool": "gea1fk7lsvktssz99ngd08w5j7audaklmw6mnzu824",
    "kyc_vault_address": "gea1v02eyh7c40kuca3xgqfckyc2rjqy62ll566t38",
    "gov_addresses": {
      "gov_1": "gea10v2m39wmarwh9xms4twjqzqxld8sk2hc98k38t",
      "gov_2": "gea1m0zj4kdn48v5cp9zf0tdlhw3z4u3uw2cnhqe2c",
      "gov_3": "gea1hq2hr6ax3ezpgf3q4pgxsrwvajk3qr7wq7wgnr",
      "gov_4": "gea12fpwkdvnpcz83gnntyggezszreuz4mj8uxnwh9",
      "gov_5": "gea15r23lzaw847tcq8xrlcaxcvrjrtw76pxrhdalf"
    },
    "kyc_invite_pool": "gea14cqcrgl9eeuaaxkpfhxsy5ee7xmf64w4a3ymee"
  },
    {
      "region_id": "chn",
      "operator_address": "gea15ut5l6n878g7p9p8y2qkfn7358aqqjrhhaj724",
      "delegation_address": "gea1aq0srphrzmctqvg9j87ffefz2gc46znujyyr7w",
      "base_account": "gea1hfsh9t5n7r4y390je7us9z9z39ypqswnk8t0fe",
      "fixed_delegation_account": "gea199kjuxd27adtu3yz8lmlzjcnx4htp9xgq5ttu3",
      "region_gas_fee_account": "gea1tsmmraupu6062tp7skea0evcu63vdhlpamk37d",
      "swap_pool": "gea1jxr80e6dnjvf8529fjgem66zxr0xtd8rrjpq3r",
      "kyc_vault_address": "gea1r3mmlsnhtlpf68dnnmqt64zfh2dqs3wsnghxc9",
      "gov_addresses": {
        "gov_1": "gea12pv47fl2q0ydwnyzqnz4kax55xaqs03ue4sgpe",
        "gov_2": "gea109rzcdwht0q5dhkrff4us250lfchw36hsdqr59",
        "gov_3": "gea17xxz6y3w6gnmceqr9mrqll5dpn385p5qldqjdc",
        "gov_4": "gea16mzzq3x9l2qy70mc38fyzxupj6h85nfw8hdpu3",
        "gov_5": "gea1d7j236aswq4s4flq9vcypust0ft6r4mkqxlujv"
      },
      "kyc_invite_pool": "gea1p29vps2ng9tjj3va4hmu8xv60hwe0hphumqevp"
    }
  ]
}
```

*****
The GraphQl query for this endpoint is:
``` graphql
query region_account_list ($order_by: [region_states_order_by!] = {region_total_ans:desc}) {
  region_account_list: region_states(order_by: $order_by) {
    region_id
    operator_address
    delegation_address
    base_account
    fixed_delegation_account
    region_gas_fee_account
    swap_pool
    kyc_vault_address
    gov_addresses
    kyc_invite_pool
  }
}

```

get.description:
## 查询某一届竞选某个候选人的得票记录
根据某一届的竞选ID和候选人的地址，查询该候选人的得票记录
- @author: Jack
- 请求方式：get
- 请求路径：/api/rest/committee/candidate_detail
- 请求参数：election_id：竞选ID；address：候选人地址

```js
{
    "committee_candidate_infos": [
        {
            "candidate_address": "gea12g0y6m8hmfkcy6c48xeqc230het6lanwqla593",
            "candidate_id": 3,
            "election_id": 4,
            "vote_amount_ugag": 200000000,
            "is_elected": true
        }
    ]
}
```

*****
The GraphQl query for this endpoint is:
``` graphql
query candidate_info_by_id ($election_id: bigint!, $address: String!) {
  committee_candidate_infos(where: {election_id:{_eq:$election_id},candidate_address:{_eq:$address}}, order_by: {candidate_id:asc}) {
    candidate_address
    candidate_id
    election_id
    vote_amount_ugag
    is_elected
  }
}

```

parameters.description: Your x-hasura-admin-secret will be used for authentication of the API request.

get.description:
## 查询所输入key是否存在
- @author: Jack
- 请求方式：get
- 请求路径：/api/rest/query_exists
- 请求参数：key
### 返回的字段包含以下类型
- block
- hub_transition
- checkin_transaction
- account
- module_account
- null
-----
*****
The GraphQl query for this endpoint is:
``` graphql
query queryKey ($key: String!) {
  existence_check(args: {key:$key}) {
    search_type
  }
}

```

get.description:
查询指定地址在指定交易中的资产变化

- 请求参数：address: 地址, tx_hash: 交易hash
- 请求方式：GET
- 返回结果示例

``` json
{
    "asset_change_logs": [
        {
            "address": "gea1fqua3uandg7g802evdvdmmlz6snxrde257txhl",
            "before_change": [
                "899600001ugea",
                "1ugag"
            ],
            "change": [
                "-399999ugea",
                "1ugag"
            ],
            "after_change": [
                "899200002ugea",
                "2ugag"
            ],
            "height": 2395,
            "tx_hash": "C9CDC78CE435E5BFD663896D3BF28AD45D0C4E5B5535BFF772AA44CED22F1774",
            "trigger_by": "{ante_handler,gea.staking.MsgWithdrawDelegationInterest}"
        }
    ]
}
```
******
The GraphQl query for this endpoint is:
``` graphql
query asset_change_log ($address: String!, $tx_hash: String!) {
  asset_change_logs: asset_change_logs_view(where: {address:{_eq:$address},tx_hash:{_eq:$tx_hash}}) {
    address
    before_change
    change
    after_change
    height
    tx_hash
    trigger_by
  }
}

```

get.description:
## 查询提案详情
根据提案ID查询提案详情
- @author: Jack
- 请求方式：get
- 请求路径：/api/rest/gov/proposal/detail
- 请求参数：proposal_id

```json
{
    "proposal": [
        {
            "id": 10,
            "title": "v2upgrade",
            "type": "/cosmos.gov.v1.MsgExecLegacyContent",
            "version": "v2",
            "status": "PROPOSAL_STATUS_REJECTED",
            "height": "100000",
            "uri": "",
            "description": "v11",
            "proposer_address": "gea19c29dhpsg4udjk5fvafwu3txtd85dkpy2zdqnd",
            "submit_time": "2025-04-11T10:39:49.584926+00:00",
            "voting_start_time": "2025-04-11T11:52:35.820795+00:00",
            "voting_end_time": "2025-04-13T11:52:35.820795+00:00",
            "deposit": [
                {
                    "transaction_hash": "787C6D0654CE0C95BB60C7C93871F2DF8B301022827BFFE2401AB0510187F0E2"
                }
            ],
            "vote_tally": [
                {
                    "yes": "0",
                    "no": "100000000",
                    "no_with_veto": "0",
                    "abstain": "0"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
```

*****
The GraphQl query for this endpoint is:
``` graphql
query detail ($proposal_id: Int) {
  proposal(where: {id:{_eq:$proposal_id}}) {
    id
    title
    type: content(path: "$.[0].[\"@type\"]")
    version: content(path: "$.[0].content.plan.info")
    status
    height: content(path: "$.[0].content.plan.height")
    uri
    description
    proposer_address
    submit_time
    voting_start_time
    voting_end_time
    deposit(limit: 1, order_by: {timestamp:asc}) {
      tx_hash: transaction_hash
    }
    vote_tally {
      yes
      no
      no_with_veto
      abstain
    }
  }
}

```
